mapper.sql: a.ID as id, a.ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, a.TRADE_EXPERIENCE as tradeExperience, a.YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER as yearTransactionsPerNumber, a.TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER as transactionsTotalNumber, a.KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL as knowledgeLevel, a.TRADING_LOCATION as tradingLocation, a.TANSACTION_TYPE as tansactionType, a.TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY as transactionAuthority, a.CREATED_BY as createdBy, a.CREATED_DATE as createdDate, a.UPDATED_BY as updatedBy, a.UPDATED_DATE as updatedDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , TRADE_EXPERIENCE , YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER , TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER , KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL , TRADING_LOCATION , TANSACTION_TYPE , TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accountId} , #{tradeExperience} , #{yearTransactionsPerNumber} , #{transactionsTotalNumber} , #{knowledgeLevel} , #{tradingLocation} , #{tansactionType} , #{transactionAuthority} , #{createdBy} , #{createdDate} , #{updatedBy} , #{updatedDate} )

mapper.update:
UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} ,
TRADE_EXPERIENCE = #{tradeExperience} ,
YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER = #{yearTransactionsPerNumber} ,
TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER = #{transactionsTotalNumber} ,
KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL = #{knowledgeLevel} ,
TRADING_LOCATION = #{tradingLocation} ,
TANSACTION_TYPE = #{tansactionType} ,
TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY = #{transactionAuthority} ,
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} ,
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} ,
UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} ,
UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate}
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE( ID , ACCOUNT_ID , TRADE_EXPERIENCE , YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER , TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER , KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL , TRADING_LOCATION , TANSACTION_TYPE , TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY , CREATED_BY , CREATED_DATE , UPDATED_BY , UPDATED_DATE )
SELECT #{item.id} , #{item.accountId} , #{item.tradeExperience} , #{item.yearTransactionsPerNumber} , #{item.transactionsTotalNumber} , #{item.knowledgeLevel} , #{item.tradingLocation} , #{item.tansactionType} , #{item.transactionAuthority} , #{item.createdBy} , #{item.createdDate} , #{item.updatedBy} , #{item.updatedDate} FROM DUAL

update.foreach: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{item.accountId} , TRADE_EXPERIENCE = #{item.tradeExperience} , YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER = #{item.yearTransactionsPerNumber} , TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER = #{item.transactionsTotalNumber} , KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL = #{item.knowledgeLevel} , TRADING_LOCATION = #{item.tradingLocation} , TANSACTION_TYPE = #{item.tansactionType} , TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY = #{item.transactionAuthority} , CREATED_BY = #{item.createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{item.createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{item.updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{item.updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{item.id}

mapper.update: UPDATE ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE SET ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId} , TRADE_EXPERIENCE = #{tradeExperience} , YEAR_TRANSACTIONS_PER_NUMBER = #{yearTransactionsPerNumber} , TRANSACTIONS_TOTAL_NUMBER = #{transactionsTotalNumber} , KNOWLEDGE_LEVEL = #{knowledgeLevel} , TRADING_LOCATION = #{tradingLocation} , TANSACTION_TYPE = #{tansactionType} , TRANSACTION_AUTHORITY = #{transactionAuthority} , CREATED_BY = #{createdBy} , CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate} , UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} , UPDATED_DATE = #{updatedDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ACCOUNT_PAR_TRADE_EXPERIENCE a WHERE a.ID = #{id}
